year.name: Year
year.description: Year in which the survey was conducted.

country.name: Country
country.description: Country in which the survey was conducted.

wgt.name: Sampling Weight
wgt.description: Weight provided in the source survey; either cross-sectional or panel.

panel_wgt.name: Panel Sampling Weight
panel_wgt.description: Weight provided in the source survey for panels.

ea.name: Enumeration Area
ea.description: Enumeration Area or Primary Sampling Unit

density.name: Population Density
density.description: Population density of the enumeration area.

rural.name: Rural
rural.description: Whether the respondent's location is classified as rural.

n_ind_household.name: Household Size
n_ind_household.description: Number of individuals within the household.

birth_day.name: Birth Day
birth_day.description: Day of the month the respondent was born.

sex.name: Sex
sex.description: Whether the respondent reported being female.

n_child_15.name: Children Under 15
n_child_15.description: Number of children under 15 within the household.

n_child_5.name: Children Under 5
n_child_5.description: Number of children under 5 within the household.

permanent.name: Resident Status
permanent.description: Is a permanent resident of the household.

school.name: In School
school.description: The respondent is currently in school.

read.name: Can Read
read.description: Whether the respondent can read any language.

write.name: Can Write
write.description: Whether the respondent can write in any language.

literacy.name: Can Read and Write
literacy.description: Whether the respondent can both read and write.

work.name: Working
work.description: Whether the respondent worked in the reference period.

work_type.name: Work Type in Period
work_type.description: Employment type within the reference period.

nowork_available.name: Available to Work
nowork_available.description: Whether the respondent is available to work, given that they are not currently working.

nowork_temporary.name: Work Fallback
nowork_temporary.description: Whether the respondent has a job to fall back on, given that they are not currently working.

hours_total.name: Hours Worked
hours_total.description: Total number of hours worked within the reference period across jobs.

jobs_n.name: Jobs Pursued
jobs_n.description: Number of jobs pursued within the reference period.

labor_income_total.name: Labor Income
labor_income_total.description: Total labor income per hour from work across all jobs.

home_hours_water.name: Hours Spent: Water
home_hours_water.description: Hours per day spent fetching water.

home_hours_fuel.name: Hours Spent: Fuel
home_hours_fuel.description: Hours per day spent fetching wood/fuel.

home_hours_domestic.name: Hours Spent: Domestic
home_hours_domestic.description: Hours per day spend on housework (taking care of children, cooking, washing, cleaning, etc.).

work_search.name: Looking for Work
work_search.description: Whether the respondent is looking for work, given that they are not currently working.

work_search_duration.name: Work Search Duration
work_search_duration.description: How many months the respondent has been looking for work.

work_search_mean.name: Work Search Means
work_search_mean.description: How the respondent searched for work

nlf_reason.name: Reason Not Looking for Work
nlf_reason.description: Main reason the respondent is not looking for work.

main_job_ind.name: Industry Classification
main_job_ind.description: Industry classification (International Standard Industrial Classification; ISIC).

main_activity.name: Job Activity Category
main_activity.description: If working, the industry sector of the job; otherwise, either unemployed or out of workforce.

main_job_occ.name: Occupation Classification
main_job_occ.description: Occupational classification (International Standard Classification of Occupations; ISCO)

main_job_usual_hours.name: Hours Worked (Usual)
main_job_usual_hours.description: Usual number of hours worked per week.

main_job_actual_hours.name: Hours Worked (Actual)
main_job_actual_hours.description: Actual number of hours worked per week within the reference period.

main_se_bookkeeping.name: Does Bookkeeping
main_se_bookkeeping.description: Whether the respondent does book keeping.

main_se_license.name: Is Licensed / Registered
main_se_license.description: Whether the respondent has a license or is registered.

main_se_vat_tax.name: Business Taxes
main_se_vat_tax.description: Whether the respondent pays any kind of business tax.

main_se_employees.name: Employees
main_se_employees.description: Number of employees the respondent has.

main_we_benefits.name: Benefits
main_we_benefits.description: Whether the main job has benefits.

main_we_contract.name: Contract Work
main_we_contract.description: Whether the main job has a written contract.

main_job_duration.name: Employment Duration
main_job_duration.description: Number of months at current job.

main_we_employer.name: Private Employer
main_we_employer.description: Employer for main job is a private employer.

main_we_firm_size.name: Employer Size
main_we_firm_size.description: Size of the main job employer, by number of employees.

main_we_home.name: Work from Home
main_we_home.description: Whether the respondent works from home more than 1 day per week.

main_we_inkind.name: In-Kind Payment
main_we_inkind.description: Hourly in-kind payment received from main job, in local currency.

main_we_insurance.name: Social Insurance
main_we_insurance.description: Whether the main job has social insurance.

main_job_loc.name: Work Location
main_job_loc.description: Where the respondent usually worked from.

main_job_pay.name: Pay
main_job_pay.description: Hourly pay for main job, in local currency.

sec_job_pay.name: Pay (Secondary)
sec_job_pay.description: Hourly pay for secondary job, in local currency.

sec_job_ind.name: Industry Classification (Secondary)
sec_job_ind.description: Industry classification (International Standard Industrial Classification; ISIC) of secondary job.

sec_job_occ.name: Occupation Classification (Secondary)
sec_job_occ.description: Occupational classification (International Standard Classification of Occupations; ISCO) of secondary job.

sec_job_usual_hours.name: Hours Worked (Usual; Secondary)
sec_job_usual_hours.description: Usual number of hours worked per week for the secondary job.

sec_job_actual_hours.name: Hours Worked (Actual; Secondary)
sec_job_actual_hours.description: Actual number of hours worked per week within the reference period for the secondary job.

sec_se_type.name: Has Employees (Secondary)
sec_se_type.description: Whether the respondent has employees for their second job.

sec_we_inkind.name: In-Kind Payment (Secondary)
sec_we_inkind.description: Hourly in-kind payment received from main job, in local currency.
